distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for nodejs10 to version 10.16.0 fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-13173: Fixed a potential file overwrite via hardlink in fstream.DirWriter() (bsc#1140290).

Non-security issue fixed:

- Update to new upstream LTS version 10.16.0, including npm version 6.9.0 and openssl version 1.1.1b (bsc#1134208).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: fstream before 1.0.12 is vulnerable to Arbitrary File Overwrite. Extracting tarballs containing a hardlink to a file that already exists in the system, and a file that matches the hardlink, will overwrite the system's file with the contents of the extracted file. The fstream.DirWriter() function is vulnerable.
notes.title: CVE description
